quote: If you want to conquer fear, don't sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.
name: Dale Carnegie

quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear, not absence of fear.
name: Mark Twain

quote: We are afraid to care too much, for fear that the other person does not care at all.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: It is not death that a man should fear, but he should fear never beginning to live.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: If you know the enemy and know yourself you need not fear the results of a hundred battles.
name: Sun Tzu

quote: I'm not afraid of storms, for I'm learning how to sail my ship.
name: Louisa May Alcott

quote: Courage is knowing what not to fear.
name: Plato

quote: You always have two choices: your commitment versus your fear.
name: Sammy Davis, Jr.

quote: Limits, like fear, is often an illusion.
name: Michael Jordan

quote: I fear all we have done is to awaken a sleeping giant and fill him with a terrible resolve.
name: Isoroku Yamamoto

quote: Where there is charity and wisdom, there is neither fear nor ignorance.
name: Francis of Assisi

quote: The eagle has no fear of adversity. We need to be like the eagle and have a fearless spirit of a conqueror!
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: Power does not corrupt. Fear corrupts... perhaps the fear of a loss of power.
name: John Steinbeck

quote: We must build dikes of courage to hold back the flood of fear.
name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Unhappy is he to whom the memories of childhood bring only fear and sadness.
name: H. P. Lovecraft

quote: All religion, my friend, is simply evolved out of fraud, fear, greed, imagination, and poetry.
name: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: Jealousy is the fear of comparison.
name: Max Frisch

quote: Always do what you are afraid to do.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: How strange this fear of death is! We are never frightened at a sunset.
name: George MacDonald

quote: Have no fear of perfection - you'll never reach it.
name: Salvador Dali

quote: If fear is the great enemy of intimacy, love is its true friend.
name: Henri Nouwen

quote: Fear doesn't exist anywhere except in the mind.
name: Dale Carnegie

quote: Love will find a way through paths where wolves fear to prey.
name: Lord Byron

quote: As soon as the fear approaches near, attack and destroy it.
name: Chanakya

quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: My motto is: feel the fear and do it anyway.
name: Tamara Mellon

quote: The more knowledge you have, the greater will be your fear of Allah.
name: Abu Bakr

quote: Fear defeats more people than any other one thing in the world.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: It is better to be feared than loved, if you cannot be both.
name: Niccolo Machiavelli

quote: Fear is the foundation of most governments.
name: John Adams

quote: To live a creative life, we must lose our fear of being wrong.
name: Joseph Chilton Pearce

quote: If you were born really ugly like me, have no fear. There's steps you can take to be good-looking. Kind of.
name: Jenna Marbles

quote: I tremble for my country when I reflect that God is just; that his justice cannot sleep forever.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: There are only two forces that unite men - fear and interest.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: I do not fear computers. I fear the lack of them.
name: Isaac Asimov

quote: A good spicy challenge strikes a balance between flavour and fear.
name: Adam Richman

quote: How very little can be done under the spirit of fear.
name: Florence Nightingale

quote: The key to growth is acknowledging your fear of the unknown and jumping in anyway.
name: Jen Sincero

quote: I love the name of honor, more than I fear death.
name: Julius Caesar

quote: There is no such thing as paranoia. Your worst fears can come true at any moment.
name: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: War is hell. You can't photograph a flying bullet, but you can capture genuine fear.
name: Horst Faas

quote: I have a wish. It as a fear as well - that in my end will be my beginning.
name: Che Guevara

quote: Courageous people do not fear forgiving, for the sake of peace.
name: Nelson Mandela

quote: Even death is not to be feared by one who has lived wisely.
name: Buddha

quote: Curiosity will conquer fear even more than bravery will.
name: James Stephens

quote: Grab the broom of anger and drive off the beast of fear.
name: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: Men are moved by two levers only: fear and self interest.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Fear not for the future, weep not for the past.
name: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: Never let the fear of striking out get in your way.
name: Babe Ruth

quote: Being brave isn't the absence of fear. Being brave is having that fear but finding a way through it.
name: Bear Grylls

quote: There's no fear when you're having fun.
name: Will Thomas

quote: To conquer fear is the beginning of wisdom.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: The key to success is to focus our conscious mind on things we desire not things we fear.
name: Brian Tracy

quote: I love the ocean. I've always liked the blue, so tranquil and peaceful and gliding. And the fear of it.
name: Siouxsie Sioux

quote: Fear is not a good teacher. The lessons of fear are quickly forgotten.
name: Mary Catherine Bateson

quote: No one ever told me that grief felt so like fear.
name: C. S. Lewis

quote: Shame is the most powerful, master emotion. It's the fear that we're not good enough.
name: Brene Brown

quote: Fear is the mother of morality.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: I believe that every single event in life happens in an opportunity to choose love over fear.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: I fear no man, no beast or evil, brother.
name: Hulk Hogan

quote: Being aware of your fear is smart. Overcoming it is the mark of a successful person.
name: Seth Godin

quote: What I fear most is power with impunity. I fear abuse of power, and the power to abuse.
name: Isabel Allende

quote: The process of spotting fear and refusing to obey it is the source of all true empowerment.
name: Martha Beck

quote: I don't have no fear of death. My only fear is coming back reincarnated.
name: Tupac Shakur

quote: Courage is fear holding on a minute longer.
name: George S. Patton

quote: I think fearless is having fears but jumping anyway.
name: Taylor Swift

quote: Fear is pain arising from the anticipation of evil.
name: Aristotle

quote: If fear is cultivated it will become stronger, if faith is cultivated it will achieve mastery.
name: John Paul Jones

quote: I will show you fear in a handful of dust.
name: T. S. Eliot

quote: Live your life that the fear of death can never enter your heart.
name: Tecumseh

quote: Boldness is a mask for fear, however great.
name: John Dryden

quote: So fear helps me from making mistakes, but I make lot of mistakes.
name: Steve Irwin

quote: The purpose of torture is not getting information. It's spreading fear.
name: Eduardo Galeano

quote: Thinking will not overcome fear but action will.
name: W. Clement Stone

quote: I fear God and next to God I mostly fear them that fear him not.
name: Saadi

quote: Do not fear mistakes. You will know failure. Continue to reach out.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Nothing is more despicable than respect based on fear.
name: Albert Camus

quote: Vaccines save lives; fear endangers them. It's a simple message parents need to keep hearing.
name: Jeffrey Kluger

quote: I'll tell you what freedom is to me: no fear. I mean really, no fear!
name: Nina Simone

quote: Fear is the foundation of safety.
name: Tertullian

quote: It's not necessary to fear the prospect of failure but to be determined not to fail.
name: Jimmy Carter

quote: I had a fear of being alone.
name: Gloria Gaynor

quote: Do the thing you fear most and the death of fear is certain.
name: Mark Twain

quote: Fear is stupid. So are regrets.
name: Marilyn Monroe

quote: In time we hate that which we often fear.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: Life is a balance of fear and overcoming it.
name: Jimmy Iovine

quote: Fear of a name increases fear of the thing itself.
name: J. K. Rowling

quote: I do not fear Satan half so much as I fear those who fear him.
name: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: Yoga is a way to freedom. By its constant practice, we can free ourselves from fear, anguish and loneliness.
name: Indra Devi

quote: At the end of the day, we must go forward with hope and not backward by fear and division.
name: Jesse Jackson

quote: I say I am stronger than fear.
name: Malala Yousafzai

quote: The more you live in the present moment, the more the fear of death disappears.
name: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Repentance is not so much remorse for what we have done as the fear of the consequences.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Love, hope, fear, faith - these make humanity; These are its sign and note and character.
name: Robert Browning

quote: Realists do not fear the results of their study.
name: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote: Do what you fear and fear disappears.
name: David Joseph Schwartz

quote: Pitching is the art of instilling fear.
name: Sandy Koufax

quote: Revenge and retaliation always perpetuate the cycle of anger, fear and violence.
name: Coretta Scott King

quote: Sounds like the blues are composed of feeling, finesse, and fear.
name: Billy Gibbons

quote: If people are good only because they fear punishment, and hope for reward, then we are a sorry lot indeed.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Listen to what you know instead of what you fear.
name: Richard Bach

quote: Love takes off masks that we fear we cannot live without and know we cannot live within.
name: James Baldwin

quote: Fear has its use but cowardice has none.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: We simply attempt to be fearful when others are greedy and to be greedy only when others are fearful.
name: Warren Buffett

quote: Fools rush in where angels fear to tread.
name: Alexander Pope

quote: Let go of offence. Let go of fear. Let go of revenge. Don't live angry, let go now!
name: Joel Osteen

quote: True success is overcoming the fear of being unsuccessful.
name: Paul Sweeney

quote: You don't know what bravery is until you overcome fear.
name: Kurt Elling

quote: There is a time to take counsel of your fears, and there is a time to never listen to any fear.
name: George S. Patton

quote: I more fear what is within me than what comes from without.
name: Martin Luther

quote: Fears are nothing more than a state of mind.
name: Napoleon Hill

quote: Do not fear to be eccentric in opinion, for every opinion now accepted was once eccentric.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: Always be courageous and strong, and don't fear.
name: Gabby Douglas

quote: But now having seen him which is invisible I fear not what man can do unto me.
name: Anne Hutchinson

quote: There is nothing in the universe that I fear, but that I shall not know all my duty, or shall fail to do it.
name: Mary Lyon

quote: A person's fears are lighter when the danger is at hand.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Do not fear mistakes. There are none.
name: Miles Davis

quote: Every journey starts with fear.
name: Jake Gyllenhaal

quote: I guess my weirdest fear is accidentally ingesting a sharp object.
name: Willa Fitzgerald

quote: There is no greater hell than to be a prisoner of fear.
name: Ben Jonson

quote: TO fear God, is one of the first and greatest Duties of his rational Creatures.
name: Charles Inglis

quote: Fear the vulture, and the vulture will come. Fear nothing, and you are the vulture.
name: Suzy Kassem

quote: True nobility is exempt from fear.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: It is the perpetual dread of fear, the fear of fear, that shapes the face of a brave man.
name: Georges Bernanos

quote: One had to take some action against fear when once it laid hold of one.
name: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: When I have a camera in my hand, I know no fear.
name: Alfred Eisenstaedt

quote: The day which we fear as our last is but the birthday of eternity.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: He who is not everyday conquering some fear has not learned the secret of life.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Let us not look back in anger, nor forward in fear, but around in awareness.
name: James Thurber

quote: There is not a truth existing which I fear... or would wish unknown to the whole world.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: To good and true love fear is forever affixed.
name: Francois Rabelais

quote: Fear not, the people may be deluded for a moment, but cannot be corrupted.
name: Andrew Jackson

quote: Healthy children will not fear life if their elders have integrity enough not to fear death.
name: Erik Erikson

quote: Don't be afraid to see what you see.
name: Ronald Reagan

quote: Our lives are full of all the genres. Fear and hope and sadness.
name: Nicolas Roeg

quote: Fear of failure, it's the greatest motivational tool. It drives me and drives me and drives me.
name: Jerry West

quote: People living deeply have no fear of death.
name: Anais Nin

quote: Fear is the passion of slaves.
name: Patrick Henry

quote: There is greatness in the fear of God, contentment in faith of God, and honour in humility.
name: Abu Bakr

quote: Fear cannot be banished, but it can be calm and without panic; it can be mitigated by reason and evaluation.
name: Vannevar Bush

quote: The world has nothing to fear from military ambition in our Government.
name: James K. Polk

quote: Fear not those who argue but those who dodge.
name: Dale Carnegie

quote: To fear love is to fear life, and those who fear life are already three parts dead.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: There is nothing in this world that I fear to say.
name: Dmitri Mendeleev

quote: I don't want the fear of failure to stop me from doing what I really care about.
name: Emma Watson

quote: The injury that we do to a man must be such that we need not fear his vengeance.
name: Steve Perry

quote: Greatness comes from fear. Fear can either shut us down and we go home, or we fight through it.
name: Lionel Richie

quote: A propensity to hope and joy is real riches; one to fear and sorrow real poverty.
name: David Hume

quote: Falsehood is invariably the child of fear in one form or another.
name: Aleister Crowley

quote: Faith activates God - Fear activates the Enemy.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: Uncertainty always creates doubt, and doubt creates fear.
name: Oscar Munoz

quote: No good work is ever done while the heart is hot and anxious and fretted.
name: Olive Schreiner

quote: Boredom is... a vital problem for the moralist, since half the sins of mankind are caused by the fear of it.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: Worry is a cycle of inefficient thoughts whirling around a center of fear.
name: Corrie Ten Boom

quote: Fear is the only true enemy, born of ignorance and the parent of anger and hate.
name: Edward Albert

quote: Don't let fear rule your life. Live one day at a time, and never be afraid.
name: Tammy Faye Bakker

quote: Defeating fear is not a light switch. For most of us, it's daily work.
name: William Hurt

quote: My fear was not of death itself, but a death without meaning.
name: Huey Newton

quote: There are few things more liberating in this life than having your worst fear realized.
name: Conan O'Brien

quote: To pity distress is but human; to relieve it is Godlike.
name: Horace Mann

quote: Resist your fear; fear will never lead to you a positive end. Go for your faith and what you believe.
name: T. D. Jakes

quote: Never be afraid to sit a while and think.
name: Lorraine Hansberry

quote: Embrace the fear and go for it. That's what I do. I don't run from it - I embrace the fear.
name: Jamie Brewer

quote: Fear of failure must never be a reason not to try something.
name: Frederick W. Smith

quote: Taking a new step, uttering a new word, is what people fear most.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: The constant assertion of belief is an indication of fear.
name: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: I have no fear of death. More important, I don't fear life.
name: Steven Seagal

quote: I have no fear of being less beautiful, I've always been afraid of not being beautiful.
name: Isabelle Adjani

quote: The only answer to fear is faith in God, knowing He loves you unconditionally and individually.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: They who have conquered doubt and fear have conquered failure.
name: James Allen

quote: The slave girl is reared in an atmosphere of licentiousness and fear.
name: Harriet Ann Jacobs

quote: Fear may come true that which one is afraid of.
name: Viktor E. Frankl

quote: Should we fear hackers? Intention is at the heart of this discussion.
name: Kevin Mitnick

quote: We fear things in proportion to our ignorance of them.
name: Christian Nestell Bovee

quote: Man's loneliness is but his fear of life.
name: Eugene O'Neill

quote: Fear God and work hard.
name: David Livingstone

quote: When men don't fear God, they give themselves to evil.
name: Ray Comfort

quote: Pain is pain, hurt is hurt, fear is fear, anger is anger, and it has no color.
name: Iyanla Vanzant

quote: If you take your fear and mash it into something that's actually useful, then it doesn't feel like it wins.
name: Sara Bareilles

quote: People are just afraid of things too much. Afraid of things that don't necessarily merit fear.
name: Frank Ocean

quote: Worry does not mean fear, but readiness for the confrontation.
name: Bashar al-Assad

quote: Fear has many eyes and can see things underground.
name: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: I fear God and respect God and love God.
name: Brett Ratner

quote: Too many Christians are living in a house of fear and not in the house of love.
name: Brennan Manning

quote: We all have a fear of the unknown what one does with that fear will make all the difference in the world.
name: Lillian Russell

quote: Fain would I climb, yet fear I to fall.
name: Walter Raleigh

quote: To fight fear, act. To increase fear - wait, put off postpone.
name: David Joseph Schwartz

quote: I have a vision of India: an India free of hunger and fear, an India free of illiteracy and want.
name: Atal Bihari Vajpayee

quote: The mark of fear is not easily removed.
name: Ernest Gaines

quote: I remember fear and I remember the potential of nuclear war.
name: Jack Scalia

quote: Courage is a peculiar kind of fear.
name: Charles Kennedy

quote: Love and fear. Everything the father of a family says must inspire one or the other.
name: Joseph Joubert

quote: The fear of death follows from the fear of life. A man who lives fully is prepared to die at any time.
name: Mark Twain

quote: Things done well and with a care, exempt themselves from fear.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: It was the experience of mystery - even if mixed with fear - that engendered religion.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Fear of something is at the root of hate for others, and hate within will eventually destroy the hater.
name: George Washington Carver

quote: Courage is a mean with regard to fear and confidence.
name: Aristotle

quote: Do the thing we fear, and death of fear is certain.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The greatest mistake we make is living in constant fear that we will make one.
name: John C. Maxwell

quote: Puritanism. The haunting fear that someone, somewhere, may be happy.
name: H. L. Mencken

quote: Men are swayed more by fear than by reverence.
name: Aristotle

quote: I am so tired of fear. And I don't want my girls to live in a country, in a world, based on fear.
name: Michelle Obama

quote: Fear of death makes us devoid both of valour and religion. For want of valour is want of religious faith.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: You need to let go of your fear and anxiety of being judged by others.
name: Gavin Newsom

quote: Only he can take great resolves who has indomitable faith in God and has fear of God.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Let us never negotiate out of fear. But let us never fear to negotiate.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: I have no fear of making changes, destroying the image, etc., because the painting has a life of its own.
name: Jackson Pollock

quote: My only fear is that I may live too long. This would be a subject of dread to me.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: The meaning I picked, the one that changed my life: Overcome fear, behold wonder.
name: Richard Bach

quote: It is not these well-fed long-haired men that I fear, but the pale and the hungry-looking.
name: Julius Caesar

quote: Know one knows whether death, which people fear to be the greatest evil, may not be the greatest good.
name: Plato

quote: I delight in what I fear.
name: Shirley Jackson

quote: Fear of death increases in exact proportion to increase in wealth.
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Fear is the dark room where the Devil develops his negatives.
name: Gary Busey

quote: Those who own much have much to fear.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: 'Freedom from fear' could be said to sum up the whole philosophy of human rights.
name: Dag Hammarskjold

quote: Being brought up very religious, I have a fear of people that look to idol gods.
name: Dolly Parton

quote: You must not fear death, my lads; defy him, and you drive him into the enemy's ranks.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Just as courage imperils life, fear protects it.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: People react to fear, not love; they don't teach that in Sunday School, but it's true.
name: Richard M. Nixon

quote: The problem is not getting rid of fear, but using it properly.
name: Zig Ziglar

quote: The more I traveled the more I realized that fear makes strangers of people who should be friends.
name: Shirley MacLaine

quote: The strength and power of despotism consists wholly in the fear of resistance.
name: Thomas Paine

quote: I hope for nothing. I fear nothing. I am free.
name: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: Fear follows crime and is its punishment.
name: Voltaire

quote: We must not fear daylight just because it almost always illuminates a miserable world.
name: Rene Magritte

quote: Shyness is invariably a suppression of something. It's almost a fear of what you're capable of.
name: Rhys Ifans

quote: Let us go forth with fear and courage and rage to save the world.
name: Grace Paley

quote: Excessive fear is always powerless.
name: Aeschylus

quote: Just as courage is the danger of life, so is fear its safeguard.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: I never dared to be radical when young for fear it would make me conservative when old.
name: Robert Frost

quote: I love the idea that horror and fear is a celebration of health and life.
name: Penn Jillette

quote: There are times when fear is good. It must keep its watchful place at the heart's controls.
name: Aeschylus

quote: I'm intimidated by the fear of being average.
name: Taylor Swift

quote: The secret of life is to have no fear; it's the only way to function.
name: Stokely Carmichael

quote: There is perhaps nothing so bad and so dangerous in life as fear.
name: Jawaharlal Nehru

quote: The most destructive element in the human mind is fear. Fear creates aggressiveness.
name: Dorothy Thompson

quote: When you combine boring with fear, you have fun.
name: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: You don't have to fear defeat if you believe it may reveal powers that you didn't know you possessed.
name: Napoleon Hill

quote: My 'fear' is my substance, and probably the best part of me.
name: Franz Kafka

quote: Fear is a disease that eats away at logic and makes man inhuman.
name: Marian Anderson

quote: Ritual is another word for fear, manifested in a different way.
name: Conor McGregor

quote: Great work is done by people who are not afraid to be great.
name: Fernando Flores

quote: Mortality applies to every aspect of life. The fear of death is the driving fear of life.
name: Nick Tosches

quote: I like to do something I fear.
name: Heath Ledger

quote: None but a coward dares to boast that he has never known fear.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: Where fear is, happiness is not.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: I have never known any distress that an hour's reading did not relieve.
name: Montesquieu

quote: The appeal of cinema lies in the fear of death.
name: Jim Morrison

quote: Love casts out fear, but we have to get over the fear in order to get close enough to love them.
name: Dorothy Day

quote: Men! The only animal in the world to fear.
name: D. H. Lawrence

quote: It is not death or pain that is to be dreaded, but the fear of pain or death.
name: Epictetus

quote: Fear nothing; attack everything.
name: Eric Berry

quote: Above all, don't fear difficult moments. The best comes from them.
name: Rita Levi-Montalcini

quote: Fear is the highest fence.
name: Dudley Nichols

quote: The biggest challenge or biggest crisis knocking on the doors of humankind is fear and intolerance.
name: Kailash Satyarthi

quote: For me, there is only love and fear.
name: Pink

quote: Having a child, that's always been my biggest fear. I want a child and I fear a child.
name: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Let us banish fear.
name: Carter G. Woodson

quote: Men shrink less from offending one who inspires love than one who inspires fear.
name: Niccolo Machiavelli

quote: Fear is better than apathy because fear makes us do something.
name: Emiliano Salinas

quote: Jealousy is the fear or apprehension of superiority: envy our uneasiness under it.
name: William Shenstone

quote: Fear is the thought of admitted inferiority.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: I really believed that fear is contagious.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: We have the force, the energy, and the determination, and we will not give in to fear.
name: Emmanuel Macron

quote: Fear cannot be without hope nor hope without fear.
name: Baruch Spinoza

quote: I don't fear anything.
name: Bonnie Blair

quote: My biggest fear in life is to be average.
name: M. Night Shyamalan

quote: If you flee from the things you fear, there's no resolution.
name: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: Fear tastes like a rusty knife and do not let her into your house.
name: John Cheever

quote: Don't fear change - embrace it.
name: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quote: Whenever there is fear, you will get wrong figures.
name: W. Edwards Deming

quote: Stalking is a crime that can paralyze an otherwise productive person with fear.
name: Lisa Madigan

quote: Minds that are ill at ease are agitated by both hope and fear.
name: Ovid

quote: Fear? If I have gained anything by damning myself, it is that I no longer have anything to fear.
name: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: Hopeful thinking can get you out of your fear zone and into your appreciation zone.
name: Martha Beck

quote: People's choice to become vegan, from people I've spoken to, seems motivated by fear.
name: Anthony Bourdain

quote: Fear is something I instill in other people, mostly young girls.
name: Marilyn Manson

quote: Those who learned to know death, rather than to fear and fight it, become our teachers about life.
name: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quote: No passion so effectually robs the mind of all its powers of acting and reasoning as fear.
name: Edmund Burke

quote: I fear my enthusiasm flags when real work is demanded of me.
name: H. P. Lovecraft

quote: Fear is not a lasting teacher of duty.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Fear is really powerful; it's really useful to me.
name: James McAvoy

quote: I don't believe in fear - I live my life without regrets.
name: Sean Combs

quote: No person who is enthusiastic about his work has anything to fear from life.
name: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: Valor grows by daring, fear by holding back.
name: Publilius Syrus

quote: I'd rather give my life than be afraid to give it.
name: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: There can be no security where there is fear.
name: Felix Frankfurter

quote: Many of us crucify ourselves between two thieves - regret for the past and fear of the future.
name: Fulton Oursler

quote: You know why I fear people's judgment? Because I know they're judging. I know they are.
name: Kate Winslet

quote: Fear not that thy life shall come to an end, but rather that it shall never have a beginning.
name: John Henry Newman

quote: Fear makes strangers of people who would be friends.
name: Shirley MacLaine

quote: Fear is the parent of cruelty.
name: James Anthony Froude

quote: If I had a motto, it would be, 'Believe in God, fear the church'.
name: Margrethe Vestager

quote: We should not be afraid to go into a new era, to leave the old beyond.
name: Zach Wamp

quote: In politics, what begins in fear usually ends in failure.
name: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: There is no passion so contagious as that of fear.
name: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Sometimes you must suffer through something to defeat your fear of it.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: We can fear things into existence. Fear looks into the future and imagines the worst that can happen.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: Fear is a spirit that produces a feeling.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: I have a fear of heights that borders on mania.
name: Sylvester Stallone

quote: The fear of death comes from limited awareness.
name: Deepak Chopra

quote: Everyone believes very easily whatever they fear or desire.
name: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: Prosperity is not without many fears and distastes; adversity not without many comforts and hopes.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: All religions are founded on the fear of the many and the cleverness of the few.
name: Stendhal

quote: It's the most unhappy people who most fear change.
name: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: I fear the boredom that comes with not learning and not taking chances.
name: Robert Fulghum

quote: The only failure one should fear, is not hugging to the purpose they see as best.
name: George Eliot

quote: The Russians feared Ike. They didn't fear me.
name: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: Discipline strengthens the mind so that it becomes impervious to the corroding influence of fear.
name: Bernard Law Montgomery

quote: Find out what you're afraid of and go live there.
name: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: An appeal to fear never finds an echo in German hearts.
name: Otto von Bismarck

quote: There is the theory... that you live in two places: You either live in fear, or you live in love.
name: Michael Keaton

quote: The creation of God itself, I deduced, came from our primal fear.
name: Kamal Haasan

quote: The one thing I've learned is that stuttering in public is never as bad as I fear it will be.
name: John Stossel

quote: We all struggle with our failure to communicate and our failure to reach beyond fear to love people.
name: Mira Sorvino

quote: Fear clogs; faith liberates.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: The thing we fear we bring to pass.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: I do not fear truth. I welcome it. But I wish all of my facts to be in their proper context.
name: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: Fear makes us feel our humanity.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Fear is the mother of foresight.
name: Thomas Hardy

quote: To him who is in fear everything rustles.
name: Sophocles

quote: That man is prudent who neither hopes nor fears anything from the uncertain events of the future.
name: Anatole France

quote: Fear, to me, is a guiding thing more than anything.
name: Mac Miller

quote: My biggest fear is mindlessly and stupidly repeating myself.
name: John Lydon

quote: I have no fear of photography as long as it cannot be used in heaven and in hell.
name: Edvard Munch

quote: The Christian fear of the pagan outlook has damaged the whole consciousness of man.
name: D. H. Lawrence

quote: Love is what we were born with. Fear is what we learned here.
name: Marianne Williamson

quote: A fear of the unknown keeps a lot of people from leaving bad situations.
name: Kathie Lee Gifford

quote: My worst fear is my music won't connect with the public.
name: Adele

quote: A peace that depends on fear is nothing but a suppressed war.
name: Henry Van Dyke

quote: People can't think when their minds are clouded with fear.
name: Hamza Yusuf

quote: Loneliness is, I think, people's biggest fear, whether they are conscious of it or not.
name: Andrew Stanton

quote: There's two sorts of fear: one you embrace and one you should listen to and turn the other way.
name: Matthew McConaughey

quote: You pretend to be more eccentric than you actually are because you fear you are an interchangeable cog.
name: Douglas Coupland

quote: Fear is real, but so is love.
name: Alice Walker

quote: Every man, through fear, mugs his aspirations a dozen times a day.
name: Brendan Behan

quote: There is no hope unmingled with fear, and no fear unmingled with hope.
name: Baruch Spinoza

quote: Everyone has his faults which he continually repeats: neither fear nor shame can cure them.
name: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: My biggest fear in life is to be forgotten.
name: Evita Peron

quote: Vertigo is the conflict between the fear of falling and the desire to fall.
name: Salman Rushdie

quote: Audacity augments courage; hesitation, fear.
name: Publilius Syrus

quote: The fearful unbelief is unbelief in yourself.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: The first duty of man is to conquer fear; he must get rid of it, he cannot act till then.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: If we fear the unknown then surely we fear ourselves.
name: Bryant H. McGill

quote: I believe that fear of life brings a greater fear of death.
name: David Blaine

quote: Nothing gives a fearful man more courage than another's fear.
name: Umberto Eco

quote: Organizations that can diminish fear are those that are able to motivate, create, and innovate.
name: Chip Conley

quote: You have to have fear to take risks - and I want to at least try.
name: Seann William Scott

quote: You've got to kick fear to the side, because the payoff is huge.
name: Mariska Hargitay

quote: The dread of lonliness is greater than the fear of bondage, so we get married.
name: Cyril Connolly

quote: Show me a guy who's afraid to look bad, and I'll show you a guy you can beat every time.
name: Lou Brock

quote: They hate whom they fear.
name: Quintus Ennius

quote: I think I have a deep-seated fear of being misunderstood. Or being misjudged.
name: Harriet Walter

quote: Fear is the tax that conscience pays to guilt.
name: George Sewell

quote: Fear is static that prevents me from hearing myself.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: Right out of high school I never had the fear of getting beat, which is how most people lose.
name: Dan Gable

quote: There are very few monsters who warrant the fear we have of them.
name: Andre Gide

quote: The thinner the ice, the more anxious is everyone to see whether it will bear.
name: Josh Billings

quote: We often pretend to fear what we really despise, and more often despise what we really fear.
name: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: I don't fear that a man will wear out as quickly as he will rust out.
name: Colonel Sanders

quote: He whom many fear, has himself many to fear.
name: Publilius Syrus

quote: The pleasures of love are always in proportion to our fears.
name: Stendhal

quote: I have this almost pathological fear of boring the reader.
name: Khaled Hosseini

quote: In the ring, I never really knew fear.
name: Rocky Marciano

quote: Tell us your phobias and we will tell you what you are afraid of.
name: Robert Benchley

quote: An ugly sight, a man who is afraid.
name: Jean Anouilh

quote: Only when we are no longer afraid do we begin to live.
name: Dorothy Thompson

quote: As a child, I was more afraid of tetanus shots than, for example, Dracula.
name: Dave Barry

quote: He will never have true friends who is afraid of making enemies.
name: William Hazlitt

quote: A child understands fear, and the hurt and hate it brings.
name: Nadine Gordimer

quote: We consume our tomorrows fretting about our yesterdays.
name: Persius

quote: Fear is unnecessary.
name: Jake LaMotta

quote: I hasten to laugh at everything, for fear of being obliged to weep.
name: Pierre Beaumarchais

quote: Be content to be what you are, and prefer nothing to it, and do not fear or wish for your last day.
name: Marcus Valerius Martial

quote: I'm not the type of person to live in fear. I think positively.
name: David Guetta

quote: When, as we must often do, we fear science, we really fear ourselves.
name: John Polanyi

quote: The Taliban knows they have more to fear from an educated girl than an American drone.
name: Tina Brown

quote: No fear - that's my approach every single time I'm on the ice.
name: Max Aaron

quote: Fear and I were old buddies, despite my best efforts to the contrary.
name: Peter Straub

quote: How could you fear a dearth? Have not mankind tho' slain by millions, millions left behind?
name: Joel Barlow

quote: Everyone wishes that the man whom he fears would perish.
name: Ovid

quote: Anger elicits anger, fear elicits fear, no matter how well meaning we may be.
name: Martha Beck

quote: Why is it that when we get older, we get more fearful?
name: Sandra Bullock

quote: The fear of becoming a 'has-been' keeps some people from becoming anything.
name: Eric Hoffer

quote: I fear the Greeks, even when they bring gifts.
name: Virgil

quote: I'm different, and my manner invites questions. I'm never afraid to answer.
name: Marlee Matlin

quote: Not one has shown an iota of fear of death. They want to end this agony.
name: Jack Kevorkian

quote: We are afraid of the enormity of the possible.
name: Emil Cioran

quote: We fear the thing we want the most.
name: Robert Anthony

quote: Ultimately we know deeply that the other side of every fear is freedom.
name: Marilyn Ferguson

quote: Our biggest fear is that 'Food, Inc.' will move heavy-handed food-safety regulations forward.
name: Joel Salatin

quote: Fear is excitement without breath.
name: Robert Heller

quote: I have a fear of being boring.
name: Christian Bale

quote: There is nothing that fear and hope does not permit men to do.
name: Luc de Clapiers

quote: We're at our best when we put hope in front of fear.
name: Tom Perez

quote: A company is stronger if it is bound by love rather than by fear.
name: Herb Kelleher

quote: Let the fear of danger be a spur to prevent it; he that fears not, gives advantage to the danger.
name: Francis Quarles

quote: I think what weakens people most is fear of wasting their strength.
name: Etty Hillesum

quote: Fear usually looks like anger.
name: Krista Tippett

quote: I've spent most of my life in prison. I was a prisoner of my fear and my low self-esteem.
name: Gerry Cooney

quote: Superstition is only the fear of belief, while religion is the confidence.
name: Marguerite Gardiner

quote: No one should have to live in fear.
name: Jeff Fortenberry

quote: Humble souls are fearful of their own strength.
name: William Gurnall

quote: What we have most to fear is failure of the heart.
name: Sonia Johnson

quote: When you're fearful, you stumble.
name: Jenna Jameson
